extendedInfo.description: Please note: the Gromit Unleashed trail is now over, but you can still download the cracking âDetect-O-Gromitâ app as a memento of the trail.All proceeds from app purchases will go to the Wallace & Gromitâs Grand Appeal charity (www.grandappeal.org.uk). Over the last 10 weeks, 80 iconic sculptures created by local and international artists using the Oscar-award-winning Aardman Animations character Gromit, have adorned the streets of Bristol in a public art trail, âGromit Unleashedâ, a collaboration between Aardman Animations and Wallace & Gromitâs Grand Appeal, the Bristol Childrenâs Hospital Charity.On the âDetect-O-Gromitâ charity app, you can:â¢	Watch exclusive 'making of' films from Gromit Unleashed artistsâ¢	Listen to exclusive audio content about some of Bristolâs most famous landmarksâ¢	Find top tips on making the most of your time in BristolKeep an eye out for the Greatest Dog Show on Earth from 18th to 22nd September â all the Gromits will be together at the Royal West of England Academy, and you can see any sculptures you missed during the trail.

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Works perfectly  Great way to keep track of the gromits i have found. Definetly worth the money
reviews.author: Alfie Cummings

reviews.title: Functional but flawed.
reviews.comment: Biggest flaw being that you can\'t say u found the London one if you are not near it.
reviews.author: Paul Forsythe

reviews.title: Much Much better after updates
reviews.comment: Originally gave this one star as could not log finds - GPS was out. Developers have now improved this and the app works a treat for us. Our family have loved getting out and about in bristol gromit searching. The app has certainly helped choose where to go next... we just need a dual \"found gromit\" button to stop the kids fighting over who logs the finds!!!! Thanks
reviews.author: Tony Jackson

reviews.title: Fail
reviews.comment: Downloaded 3 times each time invalid package file. Thanks for wasting my data allowance.
reviews.author: Alexander Overfield

reviews.title: In response to your response...
reviews.comment: Im not trying to unfind gromits though. Im trying to find the london one as I forgot to click found u wen I was in london!! I have android phone, and the mist up to date app and it still doesnt let me find it with gps turned off.  I appreciate you guys getting back to me however you have said if I just update my app I should be able to click found you with gps turned off. Problem with this is that I have the latest version of the app already and it wont let me do this...
reviews.author: David Manaei

reviews.title: Good enough for Gromit hunting
reviews.comment: The UI could do with improving (the back button can be inconsistent, the UI is obviously cloned from the iPhone, some areas are low-res and the info on the Gromit page triggers too easily when you want to scroll) but having been out on the hunt with the app then it does what you need well enough - we found the Gromits we were looking for quite easily using the map.
reviews.author: John Doe

reviews.title: Quite annoying
reviews.comment: Takes huge 25mb phone memory. Kept crashing. Most annoying is the back button. when you click on a grommit on the map to view or find it and then go back to map it goes to some random place and have wait for GPS to find you again. Resorted to more reliable paper map in the end.
reviews.author: Ian Johnson

reviews.title: Photos lost.
reviews.comment: The app, as mentioned by others only records one photo per gromit which means I lost many a photo. Be warned. Just use your camera function separately.  Very disappointed.
reviews.author: Matthew Townsend

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Brilliant being able to read extra info about each gromit and artist...fab little app....can the developers help me tick off the London gromit? I took a photo with the gromit there before getting the app...and can\'t seem to tick it off now im not in London?  Have tried turning off gps (and wi-fi and mobile internet - just in case) but no luck
reviews.author: Laura dixon

reviews.title: Can\'t get past the start-up
reviews.comment: I won\'t ask for a refund from a charity, but now i will never find the Gromits! Will have to try again next weekend with my Nexus to see if that works any better. This has just topped off a really bad day with a swirl of turd. Very disappointed.
reviews.author: Midori Wilkinson

reviews.title: Great very helpful
reviews.comment: This app is very helpful although GPS is slow it is worth getting  I don\'t understand what all the bad comments are about but if your going for a day out gromit hunting download this app first
reviews.author: Christian Southway

reviews.title: Exellent
reviews.comment: I enjoyed the trail, and the app was very helpful finding the Gromits further from thje city centre, and keeping track of where I\'d been.
reviews.author: Gyles Harvey

reviews.title: Where is social element?
reviews.comment: I can forgive the bad graphics & usability as this might be the companies first app but not adding social sharing of images/achievements is a huge mistake.  Still can\'t find the share button on Nexus 4 even after reply from dev?? Am I missing something? (see above for usability)
reviews.author: Andy Barber

reviews.title: Cracking app gromits :-P
reviews.comment: I love this app and it\'s working really well to help me find more every time I go out... only point I could make is to create a button for us to see all the gromits we\'ve FOUND :-) thanks for helping the children\'s hospital in such a fun way xxx Found 56 in the end :-D
reviews.author: Paige Robinson

reviews.title: Really good map features
reviews.comment: Great content with explanations about each Gromit statue. Made it much easier to locate the statues. Could be improved by giving some indication of which of the Gromit statues are indoors and the latest time you can visit them. :-)
reviews.author: Hannah Keet

reviews.title: Be aware!
reviews.comment: Good app but be aware that the photo option ONLY saves the last shot you take. Only just found out after getting home from 4hrs hunting to find I don\'t have some great shots. Gutted
reviews.author: Stephen Brown

reviews.title: Ok but...
reviews.comment: Really good app and really fun for the kids.. Only flaw I would say is it doesnt tell u exactly where they are like on the paper map it will say.. \'At the cascade steps\' for example or \'inside hotel du vin\' instead of spending hours following a GPS not quite sure where u are.
reviews.author: Victoria Armstrong

reviews.title: Invalid package data on GS3
reviews.comment: Tried to download it on wifi each time it fails to install because of invalid package data (429) ?!.  Very disappointed & cannot get a refund now as tried to install it multiple times.  Have cleared cached processes on phone also as advised  should have read all the reviews before buying as gs3 and s3 minis appear to be a problem with this app.  Nice idea shame it doesnt work.
reviews.author: Lucy Daniels

reviews.title: Crashes every time I open it
reviews.comment: If the money wasn\'t going to charity I would be thoroughly annoyed! Please fix. Samsung Galaxy S2
reviews.author: Julie Humphries

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works perfectly, fun sounds. Good cause. Done
reviews.author: Richard Hopkins
